Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
20.12.2013 JH SCR18565 Changed bankaccount/IBAN handling, removed BankID
26.09.2013 SH SCR18433 Fields in tabular view are now parkable (not modifiable)
18.09.2013 SH SCR18414 Fix bug where PIO.DCBA_ID is updatde (was DCBA_DEBC_NO now DCBA_ID)
05.08.2013 GB SCR18317 Changed size of the DCBA_BANKSWIFT field
09.07.2013 SH SCR18237 Introduced DCBA_ID (changed also parameters)
12.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
20.02.2013 JH SCR17961 Changed permission handling for new and modify buttons
07.09.2012 JH SCR17542 Allow modification if HOFF_APPROVEBANKACCOUNTS = 'Y'
28.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
19.12.2011 GB SCR16981 Extended condition for deletion MQ_DETAIL
15.07.2011 SH SCR15704 Changed test to fetch HOFF_APPROVEBANKACCOUNTS, now
again with HOFF_CODE = CLNT203_OFFICE; If ODC002BA is called as selection list
and PI.PROGID=ODC005A then only DCBA rows where DCBA_USEFORAUTOMATICCOLL
= 'N' are presented
10.01.2010 SH SCR16079 Added test on modifiy rights to enable buton New
21.10.2010 SH SCR15704 Undo changed test to fetch HOFF_APPROVEBANKACCOUNTS
21.07.2010 SH SCR15659 Changed test to fetch HOFF_APPROVEBANKACCOUNTS, now
with HOFF_CODE = CLNT203_OFFICE
15.06.2010 GB SCR15584 Extended test for create and modify mode are alowed
26.08.2009 SH SCR14823 Added DCBA_WAITFORAPPROVAL, if 'Y' then the line
is displayed in blue; Added deletion of MQ249 if button Delete is pressed
25.08.2008 SH SCR13546 Button Delete is now always enabled if users have modify
06.05.2008 SH SCR13546 Fixed problems to disable modifications in case of
program is called from ODC002, ODC005A
10.04.2008 SH SCR13508 Extended handling to enable/disable functions
New / Modify / Delete
01.04.2008 GB SCR13509 Changed condition for allowed to add / modify
04.04.2006 CO SCR10810 Disabled Button Add and Modify in special cases
@ODC002BA could be used as normal maintenance program if called from
ODC002, then PI.SelectionProgram = FALSE or as selection program
(= F5 list) including the possibillty to modify DCBA rows, then
PI.SelectionProgram = TRUE
-- Button handling
-- Modify mode not allowed in case of approval is required and
-- if ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y and there is no row in USUG_USERS_A_USERGROUP
-- Create mode not allowed
-- if ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y and there is no row in USUG_USERS_A_USERGROUP
-- Button handling

DisplayName.val: Use this bank for the auto collections

Text.val: -- UserAction 20 only possible if ODC002BA is used as selection program

ColumnTitle.valUnicode: Use this bank for the auto collections

Text.val: Ask for confirmation
-- only if DCBA_WAITFORAPPROVAL = Y select MQ_DETAIL where MQDT_MQTY_ID = 249 and MQDT_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO
